resources.string: Scanned QR does not contain a valid URL
Google Play Services were not detected on this device, to use the QR Scan function Play Services must be installed
If your PiFire server requires authentication enter it here or continue if not required
Enter your PiFire server address. You should set this to be a static IP address or set it up to be a resolvable DNS address
Connection to your PiFire server is now complete. Name your grill below and continue to finish the setup process
PiFire has responded with an authentication error. Verify your credentials are correct and try again

This application will trust self signed certificates that are imported to Android credential storage. Please verify your certificate is imported or the application will fail to connect. If you are using a trusted certificate please check your server for other ssl issues
You will need to consent to the OneSignal data privacy later if you wish to have PiFire Android receive push notifications
